author: manjeetbhati
body:
<!--


Powershell 7 stucks forever while remoting to ubuntu 20.04 (works fine with ubuntu 18)

-->

## Steps to reproduce
icm to ubuntu 20.04
icm -HostName "hostname" -UserName "username" -ScriptBlock {ip a}

## Expected behavior

It should be able to return results if powershell is configured in client and server



## Actual behavior

It doesn't work

```

## Environment data



```none

```

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: As far as I know, PowerShell is not supported in Ubuntu 20.04 yet. /cc @adityapatwardhan to confirm.

title: Powershell 7 remoting to ubuntu 20.04 doesn't work
